name: css-counter-reset
description: Css module of single purpose classes for counter reset

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-counter-reset.css > css/css-counter-reset.css && tachyons src/css-counter-reset.css --minify > css/css-counter-reset.min.css && tachyons src/css-counter-reset.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
